translations.chinese: 六月，發諸侯王、列侯徒隸二萬人城長安。
translations.english: In the sixth month, he mobilized 20,000 convict laborers from the feudal lords and marquises to wall Chang'an.
In autumn, seventh month, the imperial stables suffered disaster.
King Zhao Tuo of Nanyue called himself subject and presented tribute.

translations.chinese: 四年冬十月壬寅，立皇后張氏。
translations.english: In the fourth year, winter, tenth month, on the day renyin, he established Empress Zhang.

translations.chinese: 春正月，舉民孝弟力田者復其身。
translations.english: In spring, first month, he selected filial, fraternal, and diligent farmers among the people and exempted them.
